DOC.brief_summary: This observational study conduct approximately 25 site United States . Approximately 25 subject severe obstructive CF lung disease ( FVC < 40 % predict ) enrol .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Determine Variability 6-Minute Walk Test Cystic Fibrosis Subjects With Advanced Lung Disease
DOC.criteria: Able provide write informed consent Males females > =14 year old Visit 3 A proven diagnosis CF evidence positive sweat test ( sweat sodium chloride > 60 mEq/L quantitative pilocarpine iontophoresis ) , genotype clinical symptom consistent diagnosis CF Able perform reproducible spirometry maneuver Visit 1 accordance American Thoracic Society ( coefficient variation three FEV1 maneuver < =0.2 ) FVC < 40 % predict height , age sex Visit 1 On stable regimen chest physiotherapy ( CPT ) begin least 7 day prior Visit 1 Able complete 6minute walk test Visit 1 Use investigational drug device within 28 day prior Visit 1 Experiencing episode severe acute respiratory failure , determine investigator
